actions.committee: House Committee on Banking and Currency
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking and Currency.

official_title: A bill to provide for auditing the Federal Reserve System by the Comptroller General.

summary.text: Requires the Comptroller General to make an audit for each fiscal year of the Federal Reserve Board and the Federal Reverve banks and their branches. Requires the Comptroller General to report to the Congress the results of such audit.

titles.title: A bill to provide for auditing the Federal Reserve System by the Comptroller General.
